thread.title: Birthday/Mother's day family weekend
thread.title_full: Birthday/Mother's day family weekend - Review of Premier Inn London Tower Bridge Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Lou7043
title: Birthday/Mother's day family weekend
text: It was easy to find & after checking in online it was a very quick process to obtain the room keys. Staff were friendly & the room was clean. On Sunday morning I was offered a glass of Bucks Fizz as it was Mother's day, lovely touch.
